text: (Don't forget to send the final email draft to Mr Yamamoto for tonight.)
(I'll grab a snack at the convenience store before I head home.)
(Did I forward the correct documents to the team after the meeting?)
(I'll check when I get home.)
(Oh dear, how long have I had this song on repeat?)
*It's been playing over 5 times on repeat now*
(That’s odd. I swear I left the train station at 11)
(Why is it taking so long to get home)
(Wait...)
(When was the last time we even stopped?)
(I thought the train track wasn't even supposed to be this long)
Press SPACE to continue
(We're completely out of the city now..)
(How on earth? My phone doesn't have any signal anymore!)
(It's been an hour already! Why haven't we stopped?)
(Everyone seems to be asleep on the train)
(What do I do?!)
*Train is now approaching Kisaragi Station*
(Kisaragi station? Huh?)
*I've never heard of that station in my life)
(I swear the station doesn’t even exist.)
(What's going on?...)
(Did I go too far?)
(I better get out of the train, there’s no way I'm on the right train.)
*Train Stops*
(All the passengers are asleep...)
(In fact, all of the passengers on the train are asleep.)
(It is quite late after all)
(I hope they don’t miss their train stop)

text: zzz...
Seems that liquor hit me hard earlier haha. Phew...
You have some courage there young man.
Or maybe, foolishness?
Not one to talk? That’s alright. I’d offer you a drink, but I know you’re not in the mood.
Unfortunately, I can’t let you pass through to the next town without special permission.
BUT
You know what, I'll let you pass through, but only if you're willing to spar with me.
I haven't been keeping up with my training lately, and really need some motivation.
I can already see the look in your eyes to know that you'll do whatever it takes to get through me.
Get ready!!!
Your determination will bear fruit.
Unless you're dead!
Well shit..
Yikes, did you fall on your way here?
Never mind don't answer that.
I already can tell by your face you've had a long day.
Or maybe, foolishness?
I can tell you just came across this place.
Boy do I have some news for you!
YOU CAN'T LEAVE THIS PLACE
I was expecting more of a reaction ._.
No. Seriously you actually can't leave, I've tried many times already.
Exit is at the end of town, guarded by Monk Ji Gong.
The man won't budge!
That hotel you just came from, the man who took you there was going to have you work as a slave for the rest of your life!
This is probably a lot for you to unpack right now
I tell you what, I'll give you some advice right now.
The panic of being stuck here is not worth it dude.
You just got to go with the flow and enjoy your time here until whatever happens next.
A lot of the people here seem to be talking nonsense, you’ll see what I mean.
I actually know a way to defeat the monk. But I won’t tell you until you do me a favour.
And just so you know, the exit out of town won't actually appear until you defeat Monk Ji Gong
Trust me fella, there are so many things I cannot explain about this town.
Let us just do each other a favour will ya?
I managed to drop a couple of items on my way here. And I'm not really the keen eye type.
I just need you to help me recover some items and then I’ll give you the keys to freedom.
I dropped my sunglasses, my lovely top hat, and my precious scarf.
Don't judge, they are very sentimental to me.
And don't worry! No one else has anything besides a shirt and jeans on inthis town for some odd reason.
One of the many things I cannot explain in this town haha
My items will stick out like a horse in a haystack!
Ill be jogging around town, so come find me once you find al three items!
Shoo!
Get my items will you?
Fantastic!!!
Goodluck my dude.
Oooh I saw that battle, that looked kinda painful. I hope you're alright haha.
Wow you managed to beat Ji Gong. I took notes on how you dodged those energy balls.
I'll be coming right behind you! HAHA
